dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5734 RH: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the Administrative Fine Program for certain reporting violations.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steil (for himself and Mr. Morelle) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration
Reported from the Committee on House Administration; committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the Administrative Fine Program for certain reporting violations.

section.text: Section 309(a)(4)(C)(v) of the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 (52 U.S.C. 30109(a)(4)(C)(v)) is amended by striking December 31, 2023 and inserting December 31, 2033.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
